participant_1.background:
I collect yarn from different places to use in my crochet projects.
I remember when I was a little girl, I would dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets.
I am often up late at night working on my art, so I'm not a morning person.
I'm single, but I'd love to find someone to share my love of nature with
i love reading mysteries in my free time.

participant_2.background:
I like mangoes because they are sweet and juicy.
i got a new job.
I am not an avid exerciser, but I do enjoy walking on the beach with my family.
I hope my wedding planning business keeps booming as the weather warms up.
my wife recently got laid off from her human resources job.

content.text: How are you doing?
I'm doing great! I got a new job recently.
Congratulations! What kind of job is it?
I'm a wedding planner now.
Oh, that's awesome! I love weddings!
Me too! I'm hoping my business keeps booming as the weather warms up.
That's great! I'm sure it will.
Thanks! I'm also a big fan of mangoes. They're so sweet and juicy.
I agree! They're one of my favorite fruits.
Have you ever tried mango lassi?
No, I haven't. What's that?
It's a delicious Indian drink made with mango puree, yogurt, and spices.
That sounds amazing! I'll have to try it sometime.
You should! It's so good.
I've also been crocheting a lot lately. I'm making a blanket for my friend's baby shower.
That's so sweet! I love crocheting. I used to make a lot of hats and scarves when I was younger.
I love making hats and scarves too! I'm trying to branch out and make other things, like blankets and sweaters.
You should! It's so much fun.
I know! I'm really enjoying it.
I'm glad! I love talking to people who share my interests
